title: Hillary Clinton blames TikTok for fueling anti-Israel views among young people, calls it a ‘serious problem’
description: Former U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton said young Americans lack historical context about Israel after consuming misinformation on social media platforms.
content:
Former presidential candidate Hillary Clinton said Tuesday that TikTok is largely to blame for the growing hatred of Israel and its war in Gaza among "smart, well-educated" young Americans.
